reminder.prompt: Don't forget to write a study note when you engage in informal learning.

engage.title: Pre-Facebook Survey
engage.infoText: Please rate the following scales based on how you felt <b>right before<b> you came to Facebook.
engage.questionActivity: What was the last thing you did right before you came to Facebook?

sidebar.infoText: Please rate the following scales based on how you felt <b>right after you read the post<b>.
sidebar.ratingEntertain: How entertaining is this content to you
sidebar.ratingAppropriate: Do you think it is appropriate to show this content on Facebook
sidebar.questionKnown: Is this post about a topic you've been interested in previously?
sidebar.questionNotice: What drew your attention to this post and what was your reaction?
sidebar.questionQuality: Did you examine the quality of the information? If so, how?

surveyDisengage.title: Post-Facebook Survey
surveyDisengage.infoText: Please rate the following statements based on your experience on Facebook <b>just now<b> (1 = Strongly disagree, 5 = Strongly agree).
surveyDisengage.ratingAwareness: It seems I was ‘running on automatic’ when using Facebook, without much awareness of what I was doing.
surveyDisengage.ratingActivities: I rushed through activities (e.g., liking, posting status updates, commenting, joining groups) on Facebook without being really attentive to them.
